mapper.select: /* SQL_ID : kr.centero.common.auth.mapper.UserAuthMapper.findUserByUsername */ SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, r.role_id, r.role_name FROM tb_user u inner join tb_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id inner join tb_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE username = #{username} ORDER BY u.user_id, u.username
